title: West facing 2x1 in a commuter's dream neighborhood!
posting_body: ['Schedule Your Appointment Now!!!', 'In person and virtual tours!', '3900 Adeline has perfected the union of contemporary new age fashion and industrial artistry, to give you a home that stands alone without any of the additional amenities flair – the perfect sanctuary.', 'Conveniently nestled on the border of Emeryville and Oakland in the vibrant Longfellow neighborhood of Emeryville; we are just a 20 minute drive from the heart of San Francisco, and a 10 minute drive from Berkeley.', ' Our vibrant community allows for your life to be simplified as we are centrally located to virtually anything life requires.', 'Neighborhood...', '0.7 miles from MacArthur BART (9 minute walk)', 'Easy access to 24, 80, 580, 880, 980 freeways', 'Complementary City-wide shuttle - Emery Go-round', 'Multiple grocery stores minutes away (Safeway -- 2 minute walk, Trader Joes -- 5 minute drive, Sprouts -- 8 minute drive, Whole Foods -- 8 minute drive)', 'Monster Pho Restaurant within the community; Panera Bread and Starbucks just steps away', '12 Minute Drive or 25 Minute Bike Ride to University California Berkeley', 'Community Features. . .', 'Three unique community rooms, available for private events', 'Spacious patios on select units', 'Community lounge room with TV and wireless internet; full kitchen and ping pong table', 'Fully furnished lounge areas on each floor', 'Pet Friendly Community.', 'Please reach out to our community to discuss our pet policy and breed restriction', 'Your home at 3900 Adeline Features. . .', 'One complementary AC Transit via Easy Pass per home', 'Granite countertops', 'Stainless steel appliances', 'Washer and Dryer in unit', 'Energy efficient windows', 'Gas cooktops and ovens', 'Microwave', 'Lots of natural light', 'Hard surface flooring', 'Complementary High-speed internet access in community areas', 'Controlled access garage parking', 'Bike Storage', 'We look forward to hearing from you.', 'Stop by today to come and experience your new home!', 'show contact info', 'See Us - 3900 Adeline Street - Emeryville, CA 94608', '*Photos shown may not be of the exact unit available*']
